type: Services de rÃÂ seau privÃÂ  PBX et soutien ÃÂ  la mise hors service des PBX pour Services partagÃÂ s Canada (SPC)
short_summary: Shared Services Canada has a requirement for PBX private network services and support that must have national coverage and remain functional and interoperable with existing DND Canadian Switched Network (CSN) and US DoD Defense Switched Network (DSN), currently provided and accessible through TELUS Global Defence Network Services (GDNS) contract. The service and support contract will be used by SSC for continued support of DND Switched Voice Services (SVS) PBX network infrastructure during the transition to more modernized services such as Voice over IP.
description: All details in NOTICEظف DETAILS IN SECTION 6
full_summary:
**Title (Anglais)**: 
PBX Private Network Services and PBX Decommissioning Support for Shared Services Canada (SSC).

**Title (Français)**: 
Services de réseau privé PBX et soutien à la mise hors service des PBX pour Services partagés Canada (SPC).

**Reference Number (Numéro de référence)**: 
PW-22-01007954.

**Amendment Number (Numéro de modification)**: 
1.

**Solicitation Number (Numéro de sollicitation)**: 
R000124477.

**Publication Date (Date de publication)**: 
September 22, 2022.

**Tender Closing Date and Time (Date limite et heure pour soumissionner)**: 
October 7, 2022, at 14:00.

**Government Services Inventory is not available. 

**Request for Proposal Category**: 
Services (SRV).

**Notice Type**: 
Advance Contract Award Notice.

**Tender Method**: 
Competitive, open to the public (concurrentielle - invitation ouverte à soumissionner).

**Suppliers with trade-agreements will be allowed. 

**Locations covered in the opportunity**: 
Canada (Australia: Canada).

**End-user-entity name**: 
Shared Services Canada.

**Address**: 
90, rue Metcalfe, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada.

**Contact person**: 
Sarah Ahmed.

**Contact Information**: 
Phone number (613) 240- 3126.
Email: sarah.ahmed@ssc-spc.gc.ca

The document can be downloaded from the following link in both English and French:
- English:

- French: 
    <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/22/8de3cef663b8ab2c2d53bbd5e2e08776/preavis_dadjudication_de_contrats_pac_gdns_fr_new.pdf>

Shared Services Canada (SSC) has a professional need for PBX Private Network Services to support the Ministère de la Défense nationale (Defense Department) and other government organizations at defense and federal levels with
